attributes.review: I don’t know what I expected but this app is overloaded with pedophiles and racists! Totally not family friendly!!!!😡not to meantion pictures of Donald Tru-🤢🤮everywhere I look. If I could give it less than one star I would.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review:
I opened the app and I saw a Cheeto😳🖐🏽. That’s when my step bro came in and knocked me over and got my phone. I said  
“STEP BRO NO!!” He then threw the phone out the window... My step bro is coming. See y’all on the other side 🥶😤🤭😑😠😠😬😤🤫😤😠😠🤥🤥🤭😬🙄😬😑😩😮😩😦😥😧😮😰😥😧🥵😦😳😑😮😧🥵😓😓🥵😳😬😥😮😧
attributes.title: This app is a big boi no no

attributes.review: This app takes the cake for being the worst. Like who would want a cheeto on their phone? It probably sends all the information to the government for extortion. Smh. Even photoshop can’t save his face.
attributes.title: Dont bother with this awful app

attributes.review: I downloaded the app so I would know all the events going on but it glitched from the very beginning and started sending me weird notifications. DON’T DOWNLOAD.  It made my phone extremely slow 🤬.
attributes.title: No good

attributes.review: Downloaded this app while playing with my dog. Opened the app and trump came out with a gun and shot my dog. I can’t believe trump would actually kill my dog. Do not get this app if you love your pets. God rest his soul. Trump literally killed my dog😥😡😡🤬🤬
attributes.title: This app literally made my dog die😢🐕

attributes.review: Nothing but lies and deceit from this app. I believe that this app is spreading false propaganda to the people and should be taken down. Do not recommend getting this app not listening to the one this app is about
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I was gonna give my respects to the number one orange but when I opened the app it started glitching out so I uninstalled and reinstalled it to only find the number one orange man naked on my screen🤢(pp non existent) worst picture I’ve ever seen
attributes.title: Yuck

attributes.review: The app is so glitchy I thought it had a virus. This honestly makes so much sense because this Cheeto man couldn’t get rid of covid cases so...there also shouldn’t be apps named after racist homophobic rapists. 🤢🤢🤢🤢this app is a waste of time and brain cells.
attributes.title: So glitchy!!!

attributes.review: First off as soon as I open this my go blind and I can’t see so please delete this app it is disgusting and it stinks it’s very very smelly just delete it and every one’s problems will be fixed😫🤮🤢
attributes.title: Delete this app

attributes.review: this app supports lying, homophobia, sexism, racism, misogyny, xenophobia, Islam phobia, and so much more it also made my head explode I was planning on going to the next rally but unfortunately I can’t attend because I have to take my stuffed dog to the vet I hope this man rots in hell one day
attributes.title: No❤️✨🧚🏻‍♀️
